actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require periodic cost-of-living adjustments to the amount of deposit insurance coverage available under that Act.
short_title: Deposit and Share Insurance Adjustment Act of 2000

summary.text: Deposit and Share Insurance Adjustment Act of 2000 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prescribe a formula for periodic adjustments to the maximum amount of deposit insurance coverage ($100,000), including an inflation adjustment.

titles.title: Deposit and Share Insurance Adjustment Act of 2000
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require periodic cost-of-living adjustments to the amount of deposit insurance coverage available under that Act.
